original_text: “Then you will be handed over to be persecuted and put to death, and you will be hated by all nations because of me.
korean_text: 그 때에 사람들이 너희를 환난에 넘겨 주겠으며 너희를 죽이리니 너희가 내 이름 때문에 모든 민족에게 미움을 받으리라

sentences.original_text: Then you will be handed over
to be persecuted and put to death
and you will be hated by all nations
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너희는 모든 민족에게 미움을 받을 것입니다
